Gnoll_FangOfYeenoghu_01_AD.synopsis: Gnoll idle sounds that play as this gnolls performs blood ritual over the dead Zhentarim agent's body: bites its teeth into the flesh and rips it apart howling in frenzy.

GnollRanger01_AD_Angry.synopsis: Gnoll howls angrily after being instigated / attacked by Flind.

GnollRanger02_AD_Angry.synopsis: Gnoll yaps angrily after being instigated / attacked by Flind.

GnollRanger04_AD.synopsis: Gnoll idle sounds that play as this gnolls fest on dead Zhentarim agent's body. Cackle and growl as with other gnolls, crunching is bones cracking as it eats the corpse, 'chew' is as it devours flesh,

Gnoll_FangOfYeenoghu_01.synopsis: A Fang of Yeenoghu (magically gifted gnoll) communicates with a barking hyena-like laugh
Gnoll_FangOfYeenoghu_01.how_to_trigger: - Recon: peace- goto 19.42, 44.40, 605.06- speak to Gnoll Fang of Yeenoghu

Gnoll_Ranger_01.synopsis: An aggressive gnoll lurks outside a cave where prey are hiding
Gnoll_Ranger_01.how_to_trigger: - Recon: peace- goto 33.97, 44.60, 605.97- speak to Gnoll Hunter

Hyena_001.synopsis: A hyena among a pack of gnolls - unfriendly but amused by us if we get close enough to speak before it attacks

GnollRanger02_AD.synopsis: A gnoll standing near a cave entrance with the rest of its pack. Idle SFX as it growls, barks etc

Hyena_002.synopsis: A hyena with a pack of gnolls is anxious and curious about players who get close enough to speak without being attacked by the rest of the pack
Hyena_002.how_to_trigger: - get PetPal skill via debug book- Recon: peace- goto 19.42, 44.40, 605.06- speak to one of the Hyenas

Flind_Wounded_AD.synopsis: Flind gnoll one-shot AD, when it is first heavily wounded or realy really angry.

Gnoll_Ranger_02.synopsis: An aggressive gnoll lurks outside a cave where prey are hiding

AD_CommandToAttack.synopsis: The Flind commands her gnolls to attack the cave.

Gnoll_Ranger_03.synopsis: A gnoll in a pack cackles as it waits to attack prey

GnollRanger03_AD.synopsis: Gnoll idle sounds that play as part of a pack of the monsters waits near a cave entrance where prey are hiding

GnollRanger03_AD_Angry.synopsis: Gnoll gnashes angrily after being instigated / attacked by Flind.

Gnoll_FangOfYeenoghu_01_AD_Angry.synopsis: Gnoll cackles madly after being instigated / attacked by Flind.

Gnoll_Ranger_04.synopsis: A gnoll pack-member lurks outside a cave, gnawing body of a dead Zhentarim agent.
Gnoll_Ranger_04.how_to_trigger: - Recon: peace- goto 45.31, 50.17, 601.18- speak to Gnoll Flesh Gnawer

GnollRanger01_AD.synopsis: Gnoll idle sounds that play as part of a pack of the monsters waits near a cave entrance where prey are hiding

Flind_AD.synopsis: Flind gnoll idle sounds that play as part of a pack of the monsters waits near a cave entrance where prey are hiding. It's normal sounds are snarls and growls while it's drawing the Symbol, and "angry" sounds are played after killing zhents or attacking other gnolls.

Flind.synopsis:
The flind is the leader of a pack of gnolls. Normally, these monsters hunger for flesh and eat anything, but the flind has been infected with a mind flayer's tadpole (like the players) and this has created an internal 'Voice' that guides it toward certain meat, forbidding others. The forbidden meats are those that work for the mind flayers - including the players - leading to a telepathic 'dialogue' when the flind restrains itself from attacking and calls off its pack.

We can attempt to overpower the Flind psionically, allowing us to control it temporarily in order to destroy the pack of gnolls. If we choose to fight the Flind, we should be prepared for a difficult encounter. It is strong, though far from the most powerful of its kind thanks to the war raging in its brain.

GnollRanger04_AD_Angry.synopsis: Gnoll snarls furiously after being instigated / attacked by Flind

Hyena_001_1.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_001_1.text: Wanna bite ya. Sink the teeth deep. Yeah.

Hyena_001_4.speaker: Player
Hyena_001_4.text: Get a little closer to the hyena.

Hyena_001_10.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_001_10.text: Heh. I was gonna bite ya, but you're a quick one, huh? Good.

Hyena_001_7.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_001_7.text: Yeah, yeah. Now I'm close enough to rip ya open!

Hyena_001_12.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_001_12.text: Not good enough for the pack. Can't be afraid, can't ever be afraid.

Hyena_002_2.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_2.text: Hey. Hi. You're here. What're you, then?

Hyena_002_32.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_32.text: Soft meat, uh-huh. That's what I thought.

Hyena_002_10.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_10.text: I want the meat. Can't help it.

Hyena_002_27.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_27.text: We gotta eat. Better run. Better git. Or it'll be you.

Hyena_002_6.speaker: Player
Hyena_002_6.text: Just a halfling, out and about.

Hyena_002_11.speaker: Player
Hyena_002_11.text: I have elvish blood, if that's what you mean.

Hyena_002_31.speaker: Player
Hyena_002_31.text: I wouldn't expect a hyena to recognise drow.

Hyena_002_17.speaker: Player
Hyena_002_17.text: I'm a duergar. Don't you have eyes?

Hyena_002_28.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_28.text: Grey meat. Tastes like earth. Tastes like pain.

Hyena_002_19.speaker: Player
Hyena_002_19.text: The horns didn't cue you in? I'm a tiefling.

Hyena_002_13.speaker: Player
Hyena_002_13.text: I'm dragonborn, of an honoured clan.

Hyena_002_22.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_22.text: Tough meat. Want to chew down to the bones.

Hyena_002_23.speaker: Player
Hyena_002_23.text: Half of me is orc, if that's what you're asking.

Hyena_002_16.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_16.text: Strange meat. Maybe you glow inside.

Hyena_002_12.speaker: Player
Hyena_002_12.text: I doubt you've seen anyone like me before.

Hyena_002_4.speaker: Player
Hyena_002_4.text: I'm a god, walking in mortal flesh.

Hyena_002_30.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_30.text: Oh. Holy, good holy. We follow Yeenoghu holy.

Hyena_002_20.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_20.text: He makes us hungry. Always hungry.

Hyena_002_21.speaker: Hyena
Hyena_002_21.text: What does godmeat taste like? I... I gotta know.

Flind_Wounded_AD_0.speaker: Flind
Flind_Wounded_AD_0.context: NodeContext: Gnoll idles - SFX only - A gutteral, demonic roar.

AD_CommandToAttack_0.speaker: Flind
AD_CommandToAttack_0.context: NodeContext: a howl in Abyssal - a nasty demon language

Flind_3.speaker: Narrator
Flind_3.text: *She is still ravenous, her mind a hungry pit. The flesh of the survivors wasn't enough to satisfy her.*
Flind_3.context: NodeContext: 'she' is a monstrous gnoll - it is hungry for the player's flesh. Anxiety in the player's voice

Flind_112.speaker: Player
Flind_112.text: Exert your mental power, commanding her to leave.

Flind_126.speaker: Narrator
Flind_126.text: *The meat here is forbidden. She sniffs the air, then bounds away.*
Flind_126.context: NodeContext: relieved - we just saved ourselves from a tough fight

Flind_87.speaker: Narrator
Flind_87.text: *She resists, her mind's teeth piercing your brain. Pain shoots through you.*

Flind_97.speaker: Narrator
Flind_97.text: *She severs the connection, and prepares to attack.*

Flind_39.speaker: Player
Flind_39.text: She wants more meat? Dominate her mind, ordering her to feast on the other gnolls.

Flind_148.speaker: Player
Flind_148.text: Sever the mental connection, and prepare to fight.

Flind_22.speaker: Narrator
Flind_22.text: *She sniffs the air hungrily as you approach, then prepares to strike.*
Flind_22.context: NodeContext: player is approaching a monstrous gnoll

Flind_29.speaker: Narrator
Flind_29.text: *With a shock of psychic pain, the pack leader's mind clamps onto yours.*
Flind_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The gnoll barks, freezing in her combat animation, and the rest of the pack whimper, bowing their heads. The flind then mind-melds with the player, baring its teeth.NodeContext: grimacing in pain

Flind_53.speaker: Narrator
Flind_53.text: *You see yourself through her eyes - a pulsing red cluster of organs. FEAST! No... the Voice has forbidden this meat.*
Flind_53.context: NodeContext: heavy emphasis on 'feast'. Fear and awe, describing a creature telepathically showing us its desire to eat us

Flind_38.speaker: Narrator
Flind_38.text: *Gnolls see your whole world as a meal. This Voice is acting as a leash, but it won't hold them for long.*
Flind_38.context: NodeContext: A play reflects on what they know of gnolls while in a perilous situation

Flind_21.speaker: Narrator
Flind_21.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

Flind_36.speaker: Player
Flind_36.text: Divert her attention to the cave - perhaps there's more meat inside?

Flind_11.speaker: Player
Flind_11.text: Search her mind for the source of the Voice.

Flind_145.speaker: Narrator
Flind_145.text: *A memory: the beast daubs the symbol of the Absolute on a cave wall in blood.*
Flind_145.context: NodeContext: "the Absolute" is a god - player describing memory of "the beast" mentioned

Flind_19.speaker: Narrator
Flind_19.text: *Buried deep, a tadpole struggles to assert control against the ravenous chaos of her mind.*

Flind_37.speaker: Player
Flind_37.text: Focus on the tadpole. How did it come to be there?

Flind_63.speaker: Narrator
Flind_63.text: *You see drow and goblins restraining her... a mind flayer reaching out...*

Flind_55.speaker: Narrator
Flind_55.text: *... and then the Voice, bringing order: eating this meat was forbidden, but it would lead her to a feast.*
Flind_55.context: NodeContext: continuing from a previous line: "a mind flayer reaching out..." Voice is the voice of a god.

Flind_5.speaker: Player
Flind_5.text: Search her memories - is there meat nearby?

Flind_90.speaker: Player
Flind_90.text: She wants meat? Command her to feast on the other gnolls.

Flind_67.speaker: Player
Flind_67.text: She wants meat? Command her to feast on the other gnolls.

Flind_143.speaker: Player
Flind_143.text: Harness her anger - the meat in the cave must die.

Flind_35.speaker: Narrator
Flind_35.text: *The gnoll's tadpole squirms, responding to your intense focus. It draws strength from you; it will protect you.*

Flind_2.speaker: Narrator
Flind_2.text: *Its host will feast on gnoll-flesh to control the hunger, to keep her teeth from your throat.*

Flind_113.speaker: Narrator
Flind_113.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

Flind_34.speaker: Narrator
Flind_34.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

Flind_26.speaker: Narrator
Flind_26.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

Flind_106.speaker: Narrator
Flind_106.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

Flind_121.speaker: Narrator
Flind_121.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

Flind_62.speaker: Narrator
Flind_62.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

Flind_79.speaker: Narrator
Flind_79.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

Flind_54.speaker: Narrator
Flind_54.text: *For a moment, your throat seems to fill with warm blood, spilling into you from a living vessel. Anticipation of the feast.*
Flind_54.context: NodeContext: horror, describing the sensation of cannibalism

Flind_28.speaker: Narrator
Flind_28.text: *You are powerless against such primal rage. She expels you from her mind, intending to devour you.*

Flind_128.speaker: Player
Flind_128.text: Harness her anger - the meat in the cave must die.

Flind_146.speaker: Player
Flind_146.text: Withdraw from her mind, and prepare to strike.

Flind_129.speaker: Player
Flind_129.text: Explore her memories, seeking a nearby target for the hunger.

Flind_44.speaker: Narrator
Flind_44.text: *In the cave. Anxious hearts throbbing, ready to burst, ready to gorge on. The Voice says they are meat.*
Flind_44.context: NodeContext: heavy emphasis on meat. Voice is the voice of a god.

Flind_8.speaker: Narrator
Flind_8.text: *The meat is trapped - terrified - but protected by fire. When the fire dies, the meat will die too.*

Flind_56.speaker: Player
Flind_56.text: You are of the same pack - command her to devour the other gnolls.

Flind_150.speaker: Narrator
Flind_150.text: *The gnoll's tadpole twitches in response to your command but falls limp as its host howled in rage, resisting you.*
Flind_150.context: NodeContext: hope, turning to fear (on "but fell limp)

Flind_118.speaker: Player
Flind_118.text: Harness her anger - the meat in the cave must die.

Flind_86.speaker: Player
Flind_86.text: Harness her anger - the meat in the cave must die.

Flind_47.speaker: Player
Flind_47.text: Fight back, redirecting the gnoll's fury against her own pack.

Flind_17.speaker: Player
Flind_17.text: Fight back, redirecting the gnoll's fury against her own pack.

Flind_134.speaker: Player
Flind_134.text: Counter her rage with your own, unleashing your battle frenzy within her mind.

Flind_30.speaker: Narrator
Flind_30.text: *Your primal ferocity thrills her. Surrendering to it, she turns on her pack in a berserk rage.*

Flind_1.speaker: Player
Flind_1.text: Fill her mind with a distracting joke. 'What's the difference between man and meat?'

Flind_65.speaker: Narrator
Flind_65.text: *The gnolls considers you for a moment, rage still festering underneath her curiosity.*

Flind_142.speaker: Narrator
Flind_142.text: *The gnoll throws back its head, its rage spurring on a violent, screaming mirth.*
Flind_142.context: CinematicNodeContext: The flind begins to cackle with laughter, The mirth racks through its whole body.

Flind_50.speaker: Narrator
Flind_50.text: *Catching like wildfire, the cackling, howling laughter infects the nearby gnolls.*
Flind_50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other gnolls join the flind in laughter, like a howl among hyenas.

Flind_99.speaker: Player
Flind_99.text: Her mind is too dangerous; free yourself, preparing to fight.

Flind_88.speaker: Narrator
Flind_88.text: *As you slip free, coming back to yourself, you hear the seductive hum of your own blood. The gnoll will drink it...*

Flind_59.speaker: Narrator
Flind_59.text: *No matter what the Voice says, you are meat. Everyone is meat.*
Flind_59.context: NodeContext: fear: the Voice is the voice of a god

Flind_68.speaker: Player
Flind_68.text: You are of the same pack - command her to devour the other gnolls.

Flind_130.speaker: Narrator
Flind_130.text: *Sensing your presence, the gnoll's tadpole writhes in ecstasy, echoing your command.*

Flind_127.speaker: Player
Flind_127.text: Urge her to obey the Voice; to brave the flames and feast on the meat in the cave.

Flind_149.speaker: Player
Flind_149.text: Urge her to obey the Voice; to brave the flames and feast on the meat in the cave.

Flind_140.speaker: Player
Flind_140.text: Use the power within you to make her obey the Voice; to brave the flames and feast on the meat in the cave.

Flind_32.speaker: Narrator
Flind_32.text: *Deep in the chaos of her mind, something responds to your command. A tadpole.*
Flind_32.context: NodeContext: awe - curiosity. the tadpole is a surprise.

Flind_96.speaker: Narrator
Flind_96.text: *It is the source of the Voice. She will obey it. She will obey you.*

Flind_73.speaker: Player
Flind_73.text: Use the power within you to make her obey the Voice; to brave the flames and feast on the meat in the cave.

Flind_123.speaker: Player
Flind_123.text: Conjure the mewlings of easy prey into her mind, centring it within the nearby cave.

Flind_98.speaker: Narrator
Flind_98.text: *But a sudden pulse of rage severs your connection to the parasite, expelling you from her mind.*

Flind_102.speaker: Player
Flind_102.text: Withdraw from her mind, and prepare to strike.

Flind_91.speaker: Narrator
Flind_91.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

Flind_95.speaker: Narrator
Flind_95.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

Flind_92.speaker: Narrator
Flind_92.text: *She is still ravenous, her mind a hungry pit. The flesh of her pack wasn't enough to satisfy her.*
Flind_92.context: NodeContext: 'she' is a monstrous gnoll - it is hungry for the player's flesh. Anxiety in the player's voice

Flind_52.speaker: Player
Flind_52.text: Dominate her mind, commanding her to feast on herself.

Flind_94.speaker: Narrator
Flind_94.text: *Her tadpole responds, thrashing violently, and the fragile tissue of her brain tears and splits.*
Flind_94.context: NodeContext: triumphant but disgusted - witnessing a horrifying injury that we caused to an enemy through psychic connection

Flind_6.speaker: Narrator
Flind_6.text: *You taste the blood in her throat, feel it pooling in the cavity of her skull. But she still resists.*
Flind_6.context: NodeContext: growing anxiety - feeling resistance of a wounded enemy through a psychic connection

Flind_76.speaker: Player
Flind_76.text: Harness your willpower, and order her to devour herself.

Flind_114.speaker: Narrator
Flind_114.text: *Your tadpole wriggles, contented, as she tears out her own throat.*
Flind_114.context: NodeContext: watching a beast - the flind - preparing to devour itself. We commanded her to do this, but it's still horrifying

Flind_93.speaker: Player
Flind_93.text: Sever the mental connection, and prepare to fight.

Flind_108.speaker: Player
Flind_108.text: Sever the mental connection, and prepare to fight.
